  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.JAVA_10
    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.JAVA_11
    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.JAVA_12
    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.JAVA_13
    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.JAVA_14
    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.JAVA_15
    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.JAVA_16
    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.JAVA_8
    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.JAVA_9
    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.conditions.IgnoreCondition
    Please use @Disabled instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.EnableJUnit4MigrationSupport
    Please migrate to Jupiter extensions and use @Disabled instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.rules.EnableRuleMigrationSupport
    Please migrate to Jupiter extensions.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.rules.ExpectedExceptionSupport
    Please use Assertions.assertThrows(Class, Executable) instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.rules.ExternalResourceSupport
    Please use @AutoClose instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.rules.VerifierSupport
    Please implement AfterTestExecutionCallback instead.
    org.junit.platform.engine.Filter.adaptFilter(Filter<V>, Function<T, V>)
  • Deprecated Interfaces
    Interface
    Description
    org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext.Store.CloseableResource
    Please extend AutoCloseable directly.
  • Deprecated Classes
    Class
    Description
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.conditions.IgnoreCondition
    Please use @Disabled instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.rules.ExpectedExceptionSupport
    Please use Assertions.assertThrows(Class, Executable) instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.rules.ExternalResourceSupport
    Please use @AutoClose instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.rules.VerifierSupport
    Please implement AfterTestExecutionCallback instead.
    org.junit.vintage.engine.Constants
    Should only be used temporarily while migrating tests to JUnit Jupiter or another testing framework with native JUnit Platform support
    org.junit.vintage.engine.VintageTestEngine
    Should only be used temporarily while migrating tests to JUnit Jupiter or another testing framework with native JUnit Platform support
  • Deprecated Enum Classes
    Enum Class
    Description
    org.junit.platform.commons.support.SearchOption
    because there is only a single non-deprecated search option left
  • Deprecated Annotation Interfaces
    Annotation Interface
    Description
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.EnableJUnit4MigrationSupport
    Please migrate to Jupiter extensions and use @Disabled instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.migrationsupport.rules.EnableRuleMigrationSupport
    Please migrate to Jupiter extensions.
  • Deprecated Fields
    Field
    Description
    org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest.ARGUMENT_SET_NAME_OR_ARGUMENTS_WITH_NAMES_PLACEHOLDER
    Please reference ParameterizedInvocationConstants.ARGUMENT_SET_NAME_OR_ARGUMENTS_WITH_NAMES_PLACEHOLDER instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest.ARGUMENT_SET_NAME_PLACEHOLDER
    Please reference ParameterizedInvocationConstants.ARGUMENT_SET_NAME_PLACEHOLDER instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest.ARGUMENTS_PLACEHOLDER
    Please reference ParameterizedInvocationConstants.ARGUMENTS_PLACEHOLDER instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest.ARGUMENTS_WITH_NAMES_PLACEHOLDER
    Please reference ParameterizedInvocationConstants.ARGUMENTS_WITH_NAMES_PLACEHOLDER instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest.DEFAULT_DISPLAY_NAME
    Please reference ParameterizedInvocationConstants.DEFAULT_DISPLAY_NAME instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest.DISPLAY_NAME_PLACEHOLDER
    Please reference ParameterizedInvocationConstants.DISPLAY_NAME_PLACEHOLDER instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.params.ParameterizedTest.INDEX_PLACEHOLDER
    Please reference ParameterizedInvocationConstants.INDEX_PLACEHOLDER instead.
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.JRE.currentVersion()
    in favor of JRE.currentJre()
    org.junit.jupiter.api.DisplayNameGenerator.generateDisplayNameForMethod(Class<?>, Method)
    in favor of DisplayNameGenerator.generateDisplayNameForMethod(List, Class, Method)
    org.junit.jupiter.api.DisplayNameGenerator.generateDisplayNameForNestedClass(Class<?>)
    in favor of DisplayNameGenerator.generateDisplayNameForNestedClass(List, Class)
    org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.AnnotationBasedArgumentsProvider.provideArguments(ExtensionContext, A)
    Please implement AnnotationBasedArgumentsProvider.provideArguments(ParameterDeclarations, ExtensionContext, Annotation) instead.
    org.junit.jupiter.params.provider.ArgumentsProvider.provideArguments(ExtensionContext)
    Please implement ArgumentsProvider.provideArguments(ParameterDeclarations, ExtensionContext) instead.
    org.junit.platform.commons.support.AnnotationSupport.findAnnotation(Class<?>, Class<A>, SearchOption)
    Use AnnotationSupport.findAnnotation(AnnotatedElement, Class) (for SearchOption.DEFAULT) or AnnotationSupport.findAnnotation(Class, Class, List) (for SearchOption.INCLUDE_ENCLOSING_CLASSES) instead
    org.junit.platform.engine.ExecutionRequest.create(TestDescriptor, EngineExecutionListener, ConfigurationParameters)
    without replacement
    org.junit.platform.engine.Filter.adaptFilter(Filter<V>, Function<T, V>)
    org.junit.platform.launcher.TestPlan.getTestIdentifier(String)
    Use TestPlan.getTestIdentifier(UniqueId)
    org.junit.platform.suite.commons.SuiteLauncherDiscoveryRequestBuilder.suite(Class<?>)
    as of JUnit Platform 1.11 in favor of SuiteLauncherDiscoveryRequestBuilder.applyConfigurationParametersFromSuite(java.lang.Class<?>) and SuiteLauncherDiscoveryRequestBuilder.applySelectorsAndFiltersFromSuite(java.lang.Class<?>)
  • Deprecated Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    org.junit.platform.engine.ExecutionRequest(TestDescriptor, EngineExecutionListener, ConfigurationParameters)

    No longer supported at runtime; please use JRE.JAVA_17 or later
    org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.TestInstantiationAwareExtension.ExtensionContextScope.DEFAULT
    This behavior will be removed from future versions of JUnit and TestInstantiationAwareExtension.ExtensionContextScope.TEST_METHOD will become the default.
    org.junit.platform.commons.support.SearchOption.INCLUDE_ENCLOSING_CLASSES
    because it is preferable to inspect the runtime enclosing types of a class rather than where they are declared.

    Annotation Interface Element
    Description
